sn45.170:2.0: This text merely repeats the previous, substituting a different form of the same word (_tasina_ for _taṇhā_). It is not found in Sinhalese manuscripts. In Burmese editionsa, including the Mahāsaṅgīti, it is included as a separate sutta. Bhikkhu Bodhi and the PTS include it but do not assign it a separate number. We follow this approach.
